mapper.insert: insert into db_alibbporder (ORDERID, REMARKS, PURCHASE, OPERTIME, CREATETIME, MODIFYTIME, LOGISTICSID, FLAG, SUPPORTPRINT, COMPANYPHONE, COMPANYNO, COMPANYNAME, COMPANYID, CONTET, ALISHOPID, LOGISTICSORDERNO, 'STATUS', LOGISTICSTRACE ) values (#{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{purchase,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{logisticsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{supportprint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contet,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alishopid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logisticsorderno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logisticstrace,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update db_alibbporder set REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PURCHASE = #{purchase,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFYTIME = #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LOGISTICSID = #{logisticsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SUPPORTPRINT = #{supportprint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANYPHONE = #{companyphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANYNO = #{companyno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANYNAME = #{companyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANYID = #{companyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTET = #{contet,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ALISHOPID = #{alishopid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOGISTICSORDERNO = #{logisticsorderno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'STATUS' = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOGISTICSTRACE = #{logisticstrace,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where ORDERID = #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ORDERID, REMARKS, PURCHASE, OPERTIME, CREATETIME, MODIFYTIME, LOGISTICSID, FLAG, SUPPORTPRINT, COMPANYPHONE, COMPANYNO, COMPANYNAME, COMPANYID, CONTET, ALISHOPID, LOGISTICSORDERNO, 'STATUS', LOGISTICSTRACE from db_alibbporder where ORDERID = #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ORDERID, REMARKS, PURCHASE, OPERTIME, CREATETIME, MODIFYTIME, LOGISTICSID, FLAG, SUPPORTPRINT, COMPANYPHONE, COMPANYNO, COMPANYNAME, COMPANYID, CONTET, ALISHOPID, LOGISTICSORDERNO, 'STATUS', LOGISTICSTRACE from db_alibbporder
